channel.title: So close, but still not working
channel.description: Alright...well i posted yesterday and i was getting good advice, but i had already done all that. The main problem was that i could play local, but no1 could join. The problem wasn't that it wasn't registered... A guy gave me some codes for my environment variables and i changed them, but now the runserver won't work...it just opens and closes instantly.

item.title: So close, but still not working
item.dc:creator: @Schmidty04 Schmidty04
item.description:

well…it is the problem but that didnt fix it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 10:19:26 am[/size][hr]GAH…i’m a nub…i fixed the java problem.

Read full topic

PATH- C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;

Runserver says that java is not recognized as internal or external command.
